CheatSheet Example

Hello & World

Block Quote

  • code.in.a.list();

  • Paragraph.

  • Normal list

Paragraph.

Code

alert('some JavaScript code.');

foo bar baz

alpha bravo charlie

  two spaces
	one
		two
	one
	  mixed.

Entities

Plain text:

AT&T with entity, AT&T with numeric entity, AT&T without entity.

Fenced code language flags:

Something in the AT&amp;T language

Something in the AT&#x26;T language

Something in the AT&T language

Automatic links:

http://at&amp;t.com, http://at&#x26;t.com, and http://at&t.com.

Link href:

With entity, numeric entity, without entity.

Link title:

With entity, numeric entity, without entity.

Image src:

, , .

Image alt:

, , .

Image title:

, , .

Reference link:

Entity, Numeric entity, Literal.

, , .

Reference title:

Entity, Numeric entity, Literal.

, , .

Image Reference alt:

, , .

Definitions:

Escape commonmark

These should all get escaped:

Backslash: \

Backtick: `

Asterisk: *

Underscore: _

Left brace: {

Right brace: }

Left bracket: [

Right bracket: ]

Left paren: (

Right paren: )

Greater-than: >

Hash: #

Period: .

Bang: !

Plus: +

Minus: -

GFM:

Pipe: |

Tilde: ~

Commonmark:

Quote: "

Dollar: $

Percentage: %

Ampersand: &

Single quote: '

Comma: ,

Forward slash: /

Colon: :

Semicolon: ;

Less-than: <

Equals: =

Question mark: ?

At-sign: @

Caret: ^

New line:
only works in paragraphs.

Two spaces:
only works in paragraphs.

HTML sanatize

Alpha

Foo bar baz qux.

heading

Alpha bravo charlie.

Links

Example

Example

List

  • One;
  • Two;
  • ~~Three~~.
  1. One;
  2. Two;
  1. Four.
  2. Five.

  • Loose:

    • Alpha;
    • Bravo;
    • Charlie.

  • Loose 2:

    • Delta;
    • Echo;
    • Foxtrot.
And a rule.
